name: Ahri Star Guardian (League of Legends)
description:
Lora trained on Ahri's Star Guardian skin/outfit

Master model：realistic: fantasticmixReal_v30

anime: lyriel_v13, meinaunreal_v1Beta

negative embeddings: embedding:bad-hands-5, embedding:ng_deepnegative_v1_75t, embedding:bad-artist, embedding:EasyNegative

postive promt for almost all pictures: 1girl, ahri a fox woman with long blonde hair wearing a white and pink dress, fox ears, attractive face, expressive look, closed mounth, shining blue eyes, wide hips, pink space, sailor moon style, detailed background, (masterpiece:1.2, best quality), upperbody, cowboy shot, high quality

for fullbody shots exchange "upperbody" with "fullbody"

i also trained this lora with ahri's ninetails

to add it type "with nine tails"

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • VAE: vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned (for realistic models), pastel-waifu-diffusion.vae and blessed2.vae (for anime models)

  • Sampler: DPM++ 2M Karras or DPM++ SDE Karras

  • Steps: 20 to 35

  • Clipskip: 1 or 2

  • Upscaler : img2img in comfyui using 4x-UltraMix_Smooth

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 9 (mostly 7)

  • LORA weight for txt2img: 0.5-1 (for the examples i mostly used 0.7)

  • Denoise strength for img2img: 0.4 to 0.7

Trained with lyriel_v13 checkpoint

for the pictures i used comfyui
